knimeNode.name: Table Array Merger
knimeNode.shortDescription: Merges a single table with an array of data tables.

fullDescription.intro: The node merges a single table, either selected from a database or created by hand, with an array of data tables. Every table within an array needs a unique name. In case of tables that are selected from the preconfigured database, the table name will be identified automatically. For any other tables a name must be provided by hand. If the table's name at input port 1 equals a table's name at input port 0, the latter one will be substituted by the single table. The node also allows for initial creation of data table arrays: connecting a single table to the data table input port is sufficient. The node can be executed even if one of both input ports is empty. This node is most likely only used with the other BfR Nodes for prediction purposes. Its input ports will receive an existing table array generated by the Load Related Data node, and a user-defined table with values for time, temperature, pH and / or aw for prediction. The resulting table array can then be passed to e.g. a primary /secondary forecasting node.
fullDescription.option: The name of the data table that is to be merged.

ports.inPort: Port takes a data table array.
ports.outPort: Port holds the resulting data table array.
